data.message: You have blocked me from changing my name so i haven't been able to change it for a year. When will you unblock it? Facebook

replies.message: Hey, Nathaly. Facebook requires everyone to provide their real names on their personal accounts so you always know who you're connecting with. If you'd like your account to show another name you're also known by, you can add an alternate name to your account. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2exYIsG. -Rhea
Facebook But i have two last names and i need to change my last name to my other last name. Can you unblock so i can change my last name to my real last name?
Facebook Am i never going to be able to change my name ever again?
mee too!! i need to change my last name! i don't know why they blocked me and cannot even change my name!!!
I have one open for same reason but I see Facebook hasn't even responded to your response lol they just said what they did and screw you lol
Kevin Jones yeah they never respond

Hi baby nathaly the most helpful way of changing name on fb is..
Eat hot forage 3times a week in 1year after that u can change ur name easily
